Uses of Class
imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas.Edge2D

  • Packages that use Edge2D 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas
    Implementation of the randomized incremental algorithm described in Guibas, Knuth, Sharir, "Randomized incremental construction of Delaunay and Voronoi diagrams", Algorithmica, no.

    • Uses of Edge2D in imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas

      Methods in imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas that return Edge2D 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected Edge2D Edge2D.Distance.getEdge()  
      Methods in imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas with parameters of type Edge2D 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Triangle2D.containsEdge​(Edge2D edge)
      Returns true if this triangle contains the given edge.
      Triangle2D TriangulationGuibas.findNeighbour​(Triangle2D tri1, Edge2D edge)
      Returns the neighboring triangle of the specified triangle sharing the same edge as specified.
      Triangle2D TriangulationGuibas.findOneTriangleSharing​(Edge2D edge)
      Returns one of the possible triangles sharing the specified edge.
      Vector2D Triangle2D.getOppositeVertex​(Edge2D edge)
      Returns the vertex of this triangle opposite to the specified edge.
